item.title: Voice actor history Scraping Wikipedia to see how many years ago I became a voice actor in the Aikatsu! series
item.description: This article is [Aikatsu! Advent Calendar 2019](https://adventar.org/calendars/4521) This is the 18th day article. Yesterday was gecko655’s article “[Aikatsu! Ask Spotify to tell us about the musical characteristics of the song]” (https://gecko655.hatenablog.com/entry/aikatsu_adc_2019_17)". Thing you want to do I think the voice actor is one of the elements that supports the “Aikatsu!” series. Aikatsu! To become a voice actor, I scraped Wikipedia to get what year it was cast for some role in the “Aikatsu!
